Account.wallet.CreateNew.DetailText:
The mnemonic phrase is essential for wallet security. It consists of 12 common words in English that are used to generate and restore your private keys and wallet addresses. Write down your mnemonic phrase as a backup.

+" Since you control the private keys, protecting your mnemonic phrase is essential to protecting your assets.
Account.wallet.CreateNew.Hint: Create new memonic or keyless wallet!
Account.Wallet.Detail.Alert.Content: When you send your public key to someone else, they can only view transaction records but cannot touch your assets. Your assets remain safe.
Account.Wallet.Detail.Backup.Mnemonic.Av:
• Do not take a screenshot or copy it to your clipboard.
  • Do not store the mnemonic phrase online.
  • Do not send the mnemonic phrase to anyone.
Account.Wallet.Detail.Backup.Mnemonic.Re: Write it down on a piece of paper and keep it in a safe place.
Account.Wallet.Detail.Backup.Mnemonic.Ti: Write down the mnemonic phrases in order.
Account.Wallet.Detail.Confirm.Content: Never reveal this key. Anyone with your private key can steal the assets in your account.
Account.Wallet.Detail.Confirm.Delete: Your wallet is not backed up yet. Losing your mnemonic phrase will result in losing your assets. We recommend backing up your mnemonic phrase before deleting your wallet.
Account.Wallet.Detail.Export.AlertAccoun:
1. Do not take screenshots of the private key to avoid being stolen by malware
2. Before copying the private key, please ensure the security of the clipboard access to avoid leakage due to the clipboard being read by malware.
3. Please record and save the private key properly, and do not transmit or store it over the Internet.
Click to display the QR code of the private key
